message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product and I think you'd be a perfect customer. I'm asking for $180 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. $180 is a strong starting point considering the value this product offers.  Could you do $150?
I'm still interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $150, so how about $135?
